bibl.title: Meinarti IV and V. The Church and the Cemetery. The History of Meinarti: An Interpretive Overview. Avec résumé en arabe. (Sudan Archaeological Research Society. Publication 11 = BAR International Series. 1178.)
bibl.note: ; - 20 pp., 17 tabl., 20 figg. et 17 pll. n./bl. + 1 pl. coul. + 4 plans sous pochette.

Suite et fin de: Meinarti III. The Late and Terminal Phases. Avec résumé en arabe = Sudan Archaeological Research Society. Publication 9 = BAR International Series. 1072 (Oxford, 2002). - Meinarti IV: Introduction. - The Church. - The Cemetery. - Meinarti V: An Interpretive Overview [Life and Death of the Meinarti Community].

ADAMS William Y., Meinarti IV and V. The Church and the Cemetery. The History of Meinarti: An Interpretive Overview. Avec résumé en arabe. (Sudan Archaeological Research Society. Publication 11 = BAR International Series. 1178.)
Oxford, Archaeopress, 2003, 4°, x-75 pp.; - 20 pp., 17 tabl., 20 figg. et 17 pll. n./bl. + 1 pl. coul. + 4 plans sous pochette. ISBN 1-84171-545-X. £30.
